## Block.setValue() method

Sets the value of a field in the current record.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setValue(field: string, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to set the value for. |
|  value | any | The new value to set for the field. |

**Returns:**

void
